course_title: The Leader's Role in Emergency Preparedness and Response
course_description: Students will explore the role of health systems leaders in emergency preparedness planning and response. Key concepts related to natural and man-made disasters, emergency planning, preparedness, response and recovery at local, national and international levels will be discussed.
sections: Class Nbr: 1502, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 1-3:50p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Open
